Avid Standard Support for ISIS | 1000, Software with Extended Hardware Coverage (annual)
1 rok technické podpory od firmy Avid znamená krom přístupu do support portálu k technické podpoře zejména přednostní výměnu hardwarových dílů v případě technických potíží. Realizuje se zasláním nového dílu do 2 pracovních dní od nahlášení problému. Teprve následně po výměně odesíláte vadný díl k reklamaci. V případě že nemáte Avid Support, tak se reklamace nebo pozáruční opravy vyřizují standardním způsobem, tedy nejdříve odesláním vadného dílu k posouzení reklamace a vyřízení do 30ti dní od nahlášení.

výkonný videoserver s možností obsluhy až 24 klientů. Kompatibilita se střižnami Avid Media Composer, Avid ProTools, Adobe Premiere CC a Final Cut Pro. Umožňuje přehrávat materiál až do rozlišení 4K. K serveru si můžete volitelně přikoupit 1 rok Avid Supportu na přednostní výměnu hardwarových dílů. Server má více typů konfigurací kapacity a připojení, pro detaily a ceny nás kontaktujte.

Advanced Type-on and Jitter effectsText on a PathAutomated rolls, crawls, fades, and zoomsUnique 3D deformers for twisting & bending textImport EPS files 1000+ free presets included CUSTOMIZED USER INTERFACERED’s custom interface allows editors to create advanced title animations and visual effects from their host applications.Launch as a stand alone application OR from your favorite NLE including: Avid Media Composer, Black Magic DaVinci Resolve and Adobe Premiere Pro CC.No import/export necessary. Render directly to your timeline.Real Time accelerated performance.Integrated tracking, keying and compositing tools.3D PARTICLES & DEFORMATIONSFast and dynamic particles, 3D camera and lights help make creative motion graphics simple. Includes particle filters from BCC and Final Effects. 3D particle emittersRain, Snow, Sparks, Comet & Organic Strands IMAGE RESTORATION TOOLSHighest quality image processing filters to help fix, improve and reformat footage. efektové pluginy v aktuální verzi pro Blackmagic Design DaVinci Resolve
Novinky verze 9Stage Light simulates the real world, including the volume; Lens Flare 3D c support for GPU; Particle Emitter with support for OpenGL; Organic Strands - various "languages" of the plasma and the like; Wild Cards allows you to create two-dimensional images of the particles in three dimensions; Support for 32 bit color using the GPU, Vlastnosti verze BCC 8BCC Videoscope measures the levels of color at any stage of compositing in After Effects, providing broadcast coloristics in the final stage of the project.BCC Film Glow creates a soft effect of the exposure of film.BCC Flicker Fixer vosstanovaet video affected by flickering light or non-uniform exposureBCC Stage Light simulates the light of lights, spotlights or a street lamp. A powerful tool for the control of light, adds a striking effect of the composition and volume of realismBCC Lens Flare uses the accelerator GPU with cameras and lighting devices AE for a cinematic style and create beautiful transitions.BCC Particle Emitter offers 3D designers an incredibly powerful and flexible tool for OpenGL to speed up the processing of particles.BCC Organic Strands mimics the flowing filaments of matter, luminous plasma, and offers hundreds of opportunities for spectacular television schedules.BCC Wil Cards provides easy-to-use filter for constructing complex 2D images into 3D space.Enhanced After Effects - Full integration with 3D cameras and lights AE, support vector masks directly from the layers of AE, the use of audio tracks directly to c AE.32-Bit Float Support-support for 32-bit floating-point is included in the GPU and supports graphics cards from ATI and NVIDIA without quality loss.Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE delivers the most comprehensive VFX plug-in suite ever created for Macintosh and Windows versions of Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro CS5.5, CS5, and CS4. A whopping 200 + filters include 3D Objects such as Extruded Text, 3D particle effects, image restoration tools, lens flares and lights, keys and mattes, 3 Way Color Grading and other color correction tools, time-based effects such as Optical Stabilizer, warp and perspective effects, and blurs, glows, and cinematic effects. All filters take advantage of either multi-processing or OpenGL hardware acceleration for an interactive effects design experience.Over 1,000 professionally-designed presets are included free with every installation of BCC. You can save and freely share your own presets and build customized preset collections tuned to the specific needs of a project.Both static and animated BCC presets are supported on the After Effects platform. Presets can be shared with matching BCC installations on any host application in which BCC is installed.New Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE Features:• Better Particles: BCC 8 AE includes several new filters based on a new, modernized BCC particle engine: Particle Emitter, Organic Strands, and Wild Cards. Targeted toward broadcast design and graphics creation, these filters significantly improve upon previously available particle filters. The new BCC particle engine offers: Full 3D camera and lights Integration with AE's camera and lights Particle Emitter motion that follows an AE mask OpenGL rendering and lighting of real 3D objects Interaction with an AE 3D layer and particle generation from a 3D layer Complex color gradient controls and graph maps for size and opacity The ability to Spawn particles Image collection files The ability to mix and match various custom particle textures Various special effects, such as mirror mode and dispersion Wind, Sphere Warps, and Sink Points Fractal Noise field• Better Lens Flares: BCC Lens Flare 3D is BCC's next-generation lens flare tool featuring enhanced looks and integration with After Effects. Thanks to GPU optimization, the filter is blazingly fast while providing highly sought-after functionality.Improvements include: Support for AE-native camera and lighting rigs Built-in 3D camera and lighting rigs for Adobe Premiere Pro Ability to automatically apply lens flares to user-defined AE native lights in the composition Ability to auto-generate lens flares based on luma values Ability to auto-generate lens flares that follow the contour of AE native masks Automated flicker feature for lens flare light source, using AE native or built-in lights Automated randomize feature to flicker light intensity values ​​across multiple AE lights Automated shimmer feature for shimmering light rays Edge-trigger feature for boosting light intensity as it approaches and crosses the edge Sub-beam feature that generates Star Trek-style photon sci-fi flares Colored ring option Chroma hoop option Chroma fan option Lens caustics option Customizable lens surface textures with built-in looks Chromatic aberration option• Better Glows: The new BCC Film Glow effect includes a unique Crosstalk feature that blends the color of the glow with the image in a variety of ways, giving you the ability to generate looks that are not possible with other glow filters - a real game -changer for designers searching for new looks!• Better Lights: BCC's arsenal of lighting options has grown to include a new Stage Light filter that tightly integrates with AE's camera and lights and nicely complements AE's built-in lighting, providing a much-needed volumetric feel.• Unprecedented AE Integration: BCC 8 AE sets a new standard for AE integration, offering fast workflow and reducing your learning curve to virtually zero. BCC filters take full advantage of the excellent native 3D camera and light system that AE users depend on in their daily work. For path animations and image isolation tasks, BCC 8 filters import vector masks directly from AE layers. And for automated parameter animation, many BCC filters are now able to take advantage of audio data directly from AE audio tracks.• Better Image Restoration: Undesirable light flicker sometimes plagues irreplaceable camera shots. What can you do about it? 8 BCC AE comes to the rescue with a new Flicker Fixer tool that automatically solves the most challenging flickering light problems. Now footage so critical to your project becomes usable again!• New Videoscope Tool for AE: Full-featured and easy to use, the new BCC Videoscope filter means you no longer need to switch to a custom UI and deal with work-arounds to check color levels; the scopes are built right in to your Composite window! With vector scope and waveform monitors at your fingertips, you can be sure that you will never exceed legal color limits - while maintaining the overall integrity of your effects. A must-have for AE users!• 8 New Filters: BCC 8 AE's eight new filters include enhanced lens flares, particles, glows, and lights as well as new flicker reduction and videoscope tools. New Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE Filters: Videoscope Film Glow Flicker Fixer Lens Flare 3D Stage Light Particle Emitter 3D Organic Strands Wild Cards

A powerful tool for the control of light, adds a striking effect of the composition and volume of realismBCC Lens Flare uses the accelerator GPU with cameras and lighting devices AE for a cinematic style and create beautiful transitions.BCC Particle Emitter offers 3D designers an incredibly powerful and flexible tool for OpenGL to speed up the processing of particles.BCC Organic Strands mimics the flowing filaments of matter, luminous plasma, and offers hundreds of opportunities for spectacular television schedules.BCC Wil Cards provides easy-to-use filter for constructing complex 2D images into 3D space.Enhanced After Effects - Full integration with 3D cameras and lights AE, support vector masks directly from the layers of AE, the use of audio tracks directly to c AE.32-Bit Float Support-support for 32-bit floating-point is included in the GPU and supports graphics cards from ATI and NVIDIA without quality loss.Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE delivers the most comprehensive VFX plug-in suite ever created for Macintosh and Windows versions of Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro CS5.5, CS5, and CS4. A whopping 200 + filters include 3D Objects such as Extruded Text, 3D particle effects, image restoration tools, lens flares and lights, keys and mattes, 3 Way Color Grading and other color correction tools, time-based effects such as Optical Stabilizer, warp and perspective effects, and blurs, glows, and cinematic effects. All filters take advantage of either multi-processing or OpenGL hardware acceleration for an interactive effects design experience.Over 1,000 professionally-designed presets are included free with every installation of BCC. You can save and freely share your own presets and build customized preset collections tuned to the specific needs of a project.Both static and animated BCC presets are supported on the After Effects platform. Presets can be shared with matching BCC installations on any host application in which BCC is installed.New Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE Features:• Better Particles: BCC 8 AE includes several new filters based on a new, modernized BCC particle engine: Particle Emitter, Organic Strands, and Wild Cards. Targeted toward broadcast design and graphics creation, these filters significantly improve upon previously available particle filters. The new BCC particle engine offers: Full 3D camera and lights Integration with AE's camera and lights Particle Emitter motion that follows an AE mask OpenGL rendering and lighting of real 3D objects Interaction with an AE 3D layer and particle generation from a 3D layer Complex color gradient controls and graph maps for size and opacity The ability to Spawn particles Image collection files The ability to mix and match various custom particle textures Various special effects, such as mirror mode and dispersion Wind, Sphere Warps, and Sink Points Fractal Noise field• Better Lens Flares: BCC Lens Flare 3D is BCC's next-generation lens flare tool featuring enhanced looks and integration with After Effects. Thanks to GPU optimization, the filter is blazingly fast while providing highly sought-after functionality.Improvements include: Support for AE-native camera and lighting rigs Built-in 3D camera and lighting rigs for Adobe Premiere Pro Ability to automatically apply lens flares to user-defined AE native lights in the composition Ability to auto-generate lens flares based on luma values Ability to auto-generate lens flares that follow the contour of AE native masks Automated flicker feature for lens flare light source, using AE native or built-in lights Automated randomize feature to flicker light intensity values ​​across multiple AE lights Automated shimmer feature for shimmering light rays Edge-trigger feature for boosting light intensity as it approaches and crosses the edge Sub-beam feature that generates Star Trek-style photon sci-fi flares Colored ring option Chroma hoop option Chroma fan option Lens caustics option Customizable lens surface textures with built-in looks Chromatic aberration option• Better Glows: The new BCC Film Glow effect includes a unique Crosstalk feature that blends the color of the glow with the image in a variety of ways, giving you the ability to generate looks that are not possible with other glow filters - a real game -changer for designers searching for new looks!• Better Lights: BCC's arsenal of lighting options has grown to include a new Stage Light filter that tightly integrates with AE's camera and lights and nicely complements AE's built-in lighting, providing a much-needed volumetric feel.• Unprecedented AE Integration: BCC 8 AE sets a new standard for AE integration, offering fast workflow and reducing your learning curve to virtually zero. BCC filters take full advantage of the excellent native 3D camera and light system that AE users depend on in their daily work. For path animations and image isolation tasks, BCC 8 filters import vector masks directly from AE layers. And for automated parameter animation, many BCC filters are now able to take advantage of audio data directly from AE audio tracks.• Better Image Restoration: Undesirable light flicker sometimes plagues irreplaceable camera shots. What can you do about it? 8 BCC AE comes to the rescue with a new Flicker Fixer tool that automatically solves the most challenging flickering light problems. Now footage so critical to your project becomes usable again!• New Videoscope Tool for AE: Full-featured and easy to use, the new BCC Videoscope filter means you no longer need to switch to a custom UI and deal with work-arounds to check color levels; the scopes are built right in to your Composite window! With vector scope and waveform monitors at your fingertips, you can be sure that you will never exceed legal color limits - while maintaining the overall integrity of your effects. A must-have for AE users!• 8 New Filters: BCC 8 AE's eight new filters include enhanced lens flares, particles, glows, and lights as well as new flicker reduction and videoscope tools. New Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE Filters: Videoscope Film Glow Flicker Fixer Lens Flare 3D Stage Light Particle Emitter 3D Organic Strands Wild Cards

Jako součást technické podpory poskytujeme záruční i pozáruční servis na střihové systémy, jednotlivé produkty, nebo technologické celky, které jsou v našem produktovém portfoliu. V případě servisního zásahu je výjezd technika fakturován dle následujícího ceníku.
Servisní hodinová sazba při výjezdu k zákazníkovi:pracovní doba (po-pá 9:00-18:00): 1.400,- Kč bez DPH mimo pracovní dobu (so, ne, svátky, po-pá 18:00-9:00): 2.800,- Kč bez DPH Doprava: Praha: 700,- Kč bez DPHmimo Prahu: 7,- Kč bez DPH za km Upozornění týkající se Avid střižen a hardwaru výrobců třetích stran Společnost TRACO SYSTEMS a.s. poskytuje záruční i pozáruční servis na produkty (software /hardware) u firmy zakoupený (vztahuje se i na internetový obchod AvidShop v České a Slovenské republice). U produktů Avid, které nebyly zakoupeny u společnosti TRACO SYSTEMS a.s. (v České nebo Slovenské Republice), Vám můžeme poskytnout telefonickou konzultaci zdarma. V případě objednaného servisního zásahu (výjezdu technika), bude fakturována částka dle ceníku servisních služeb. Na produkty, jejichž výrobcem není firma Avid a které nebyly zakoupeny u společnosti TRACO SYSTEMS a.s. (vztahuje se i na internetový obchod AvidShop), doporučujeme důkladné studium dokumentace a prověření systémových podmínek a kompatibility. V případě nejasností nebo nefunkčnosti kontaktujete dodavatele či výrobce produktu. Nejste-li zákazníkem společnosti TRACO SYSTEMS a.s., ale rádi byste využili naše obchodní nebo servisní služby, kontaktujte nás e-mailem nebo telefonicky. V rámci obchodní nabídky jsme schopni servisovat jen některé produkty, případně dostupnou technologii zapůjčit na vyzkoušení.

SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: Annual Upgrade & Support Plan Renewal for Media Composer
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Standard Avid Support určený pro majitele Avid Media Composer, kteří si přejí koupit roční podporu a roční stažení software v ceně Pro objednávku musíte uvést v poznámce System ID, mít založený Avid Master Account a registraci aktuální verze licencetato cena je pro zákazníky, kteří už mají Avid Support z roku 2014
Podporovaný hardware: Avid Artist | DNxIO (od v. 8.4)Avid Nitris DXAvid Mojo DXBlackmagic Design DeckLink Matrox řady MXO2AJA Kona a AJA IOMOTUBlueFish 444Podporuje širokou škálu formátů od DV25, přes IMX50, 1:1 10bit SD, HDV, až po 10bit DNxHD video. Přímá podpora bezpáskových formátů Panasonic P2-HD, Sony XDCAM, XDCAM HD, XDCAM EX, AVC-Intra a GFCAM. Možno pracovat s 2K / 4k / 5K medii s pomocí nástroje FrameFlexMožnost umístit současně na časové ose různé kodeky, rozlišení a snímkové frekvence. Umožňuje střih stereoskopického videa, nebo materiálu z RED kamer. Lze také připojit video převodníky řady Matrox MXO2, AJA, Blackmagic design, MOTU, bluefish 444, Mojo DX, Nitris DX. Software je cetrifikován na platformu Windows 7 64bit SP 1, Windows 8 a MacOS X 10.9.5 nebo Mac OS X 10.10. Software je funkční také na nových Apple Mac Pro. SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: Annual Upgrade and Support Plan for Pro Tools - Student/Teacher (Card)
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a roční podpora na nejnovější verzi zvukového software pro PC i Mac, nyní prodejný i samostatně bez zvukového hardware. Pro objednávku vyžaduje potvrzení EDU formuláře od Školy nebo pro studenty.Upozorňujeme, že Avid neposkytuje EDU slevu středním školám. Pouze vyšším a vysokým školám.

SW podpora na 1 rok, což znamená že všechny aktualizace systému jsou zdarma po dobu trvání podpory. Avid Support nahlrazuje nákup Upgrade. - nevztahuje se na žádný Avid HW (např., MC Mojo DX , Nitris DX ). Support lze koupit jen pro produkty, které byly v roce 2014-15 pod supportem. Pro objednávku musíte uvést v poznámce System ID, mít založený Avid Master Account a registraci aktuální verze licence

For singer/songwriters, loop based musicians, and audio post professionals, Pro Tools | Quartet is a best-in-class, 12-in 8-out, low latency, 24-bit/192kHz USB 2.0 audio interface, by Apogee, and bundled with industry standard Pro Tools | Software for complete audio/MIDI professional music creation and audio post workflow on a Mac or PC. Pro Tools | Quartet includes Apogee’s legendary digital audio conversion with four world-class mic preamps for connecting four microphones, instruments or line-level devices together with 8 digital inputs via twin ADAT/SMUX, word clock out, MIDI USB connection, and six balanced audio outputs for stereo or 5.1 surround plus a headphones output.
SHOPITEM.CATEGORYTEXT: Avid Audio | doplňky k Pro Tools

SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION: For singer/songwriters and loop based musicians, Pro Tools | Duet is a best-in-class, 2-in 4-out, low latency, 24-bit/192kHz USB 2.0 audio interface, by Apogee, and bundled with industry standard Pro Tools | Software for complete audio/MIDI professional music creation workflow on a Mac or PC. Pro Tools | Duet includes Apogee’s legendary digital audio conversion with two world-class mic preamps for connecting two microphones, instruments or line-level devices together with MIDI USB connection, stereo balanced audio outputs and headphones output.
SHOPITEM.CATEGORYTEXT: Avid Audio | doplňky k Pro Tools

SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: Pro Tools | S3 Control Surface Studio
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Profesionální mixážní pult. Kompatibilní s Pro Tools 11 , Pro Tools 11 HD a Avid Media Composer 8.1 a vyšší, Cubase, Nuendo, Apple Logic.
Based on the award-winning Pro Tools | S6, Pro Tools | S3 is a compact, EUCON-enabled, ergonomic desktop control surface that offers a streamlined yet versatile mixing solution for the modern sound engineer. Like S6, S3 delivers intelligent control over every aspect of Pro Tools and other DAWs, but at a more affordable price. While its small form factor makes it ideal for space-confined or on-the-go music and post mixing, it packs enormous power and accelerated mixing efficiency for faster turnarounds, making it the perfect fit everywhere, from project studios to the largest, most demanding facilities.
příručka k software Avid Sibelius

Pro Tools přechází podobně jako Media Composer na nový způsob licencování softwarePozději se budou všechny upgrady software realzovat s pomocí nákupu Supportuzpočátku ještě budou možné crossgrady a upgrady ze starších verzí, později už ne.všechny upgrady budou obsahovat také 1-roční Supportv nabídce licencí je také měsíční a roční SubscriptionCloud audio archival service - zákazník si může zakoupit cloudový prostor pro archivaciPT 12 obsahují nové metadatové schema - otevřené pro vývoj aplikací od jiných výrobcůPro Tools | First - software ke stažení zdarma bez časového omezení. Omezení jsou však jen na 16 stop max. do 96kHz, nemůže pracovat s videostopou a podporuje maximálně 4 vstupy a výstupy. Nepodporuje surround zvuk. Projekty jsou kompatibilní s plnou verzí Pro Tools 12.

120 Designer Effects and Transitions for Avid
Final Effects Complete AVX is a collection of 120+ designer effects and transitions for Avid Media Composer 6, Symphony 6, and NewsCutter 10. These simple-to-use filters allow you to create totally unique organic looks with just a few simple adjustments. Quickly generate full-featured 3D particle effects such as Hair, Bubbles, and Mr. Mercury; tap into a complete range of unique auto-animating transitions including Glass Wipe and Light Wipe; and spice up your titles with edge treatments such as Wiggle Edges and Burn Edges.Key Features for Avid UsersAuto-animating transitions including Blur Dissolve, Glass Wipe, and Light Wipe2D and 3D particle effects such as Mr Mercury, Hair, and BubblesText and edge treatments including Wiggle Edges, Burn Edges, and Sparkle EdgesStylized looks such as Vector Blur, Glass, Kaleida, and 3D ReliefA large number of distortion and perspective filtersA score of utility filters such as simple, true gradient blurs and a color gradient generatorFinal Effects Complete integrates many of the same Boris Continuum Complete technologies that Avid editors use day in and day out: cross-platform presets, the PixelChooser matting and masking tool, built-in Motion Tracking, Beat Reactor for audio-driven effects creation, on-screen overlay widgets, and Compare Mode to compare the filtered result with the unfiltered source via either a side-by-side view or a live split-screen view.

upgrade efektových pluginů na nejnovější verzi pro střižny řady Avid Media Composer. Od verze Media Composer 6 již nejsou tyto pluginy součástí produktového balíčku Avid Media Composer. Avid Symphony ve verzi 6 stále obsahuje Boris Continuum Complete. Ve verzi Media Composer 8 jsou pouze 4 videoefekty zdarma.
Stage Light simulates the real world, including the volume; Lens Flare 3D c support for GPU; Particle Emitter with support for OpenGL; Organic Strands - various "languages" of the plasma and the like; Wild Cards allows you to create two-dimensional images of the particles in three dimensions; Support for 32 bit color using the GPU, New quality of Boris Continuum Complete AE 8BCC Videoscope measures the levels of color at any stage of compositing in After Effects, providing broadcast coloristics in the final stage of the project.BCC Film Glow creates a soft effect of the exposure of film.BCC Flicker Fixer vosstanovaet video affected by flickering light or non-uniform exposureBCC Stage Light simulates the light of lights, spotlights or a street lamp. A powerful tool for the control of light, adds a striking effect of the composition and volume of realismBCC Lens Flare uses the accelerator GPU with cameras and lighting devices AE for a cinematic style and create beautiful transitions.BCC Particle Emitter offers 3D designers an incredibly powerful and flexible tool for OpenGL to speed up the processing of particles.BCC Organic Strands mimics the flowing filaments of matter, luminous plasma, and offers hundreds of opportunities for spectacular television schedules.BCC Wil Cards provides easy-to-use filter for constructing complex 2D images into 3D space.Enhanced After Effects - Full integration with 3D cameras and lights AE, support vector masks directly from the layers of AE, the use of audio tracks directly to c AE.32-Bit Float Support-support for 32-bit floating-point is included in the GPU and supports graphics cards from ATI and NVIDIA without quality loss.Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE delivers the most comprehensive VFX plug-in suite ever created for Macintosh and Windows versions of Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro CS5.5, CS5, and CS4. A whopping 200 + filters include 3D Objects such as Extruded Text, 3D particle effects, image restoration tools, lens flares and lights, keys and mattes, 3 Way Color Grading and other color correction tools, time-based effects such as Optical Stabilizer, warp and perspective effects, and blurs, glows, and cinematic effects. All filters take advantage of either multi-processing or OpenGL hardware acceleration for an interactive effects design experience.Over 1,000 professionally-designed presets are included free with every installation of BCC. You can save and freely share your own presets and build customized preset collections tuned to the specific needs of a project.Both static and animated BCC presets are supported on the After Effects platform. Presets can be shared with matching BCC installations on any host application in which BCC is installed.New Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE Features:• Better Particles: BCC 8 AE includes several new filters based on a new, modernized BCC particle engine: Particle Emitter, Organic Strands, and Wild Cards. Targeted toward broadcast design and graphics creation, these filters significantly improve upon previously available particle filters. The new BCC particle engine offers: Full 3D camera and lights Integration with AE's camera and lights Particle Emitter motion that follows an AE mask OpenGL rendering and lighting of real 3D objects Interaction with an AE 3D layer and particle generation from a 3D layer Complex color gradient controls and graph maps for size and opacity The ability to Spawn particles Image collection files The ability to mix and match various custom particle textures Various special effects, such as mirror mode and dispersion Wind, Sphere Warps, and Sink Points Fractal Noise field• Better Lens Flares: BCC Lens Flare 3D is BCC's next-generation lens flare tool featuring enhanced looks and integration with After Effects. Thanks to GPU optimization, the filter is blazingly fast while providing highly sought-after functionality.Improvements include: Support for AE-native camera and lighting rigs Built-in 3D camera and lighting rigs for Adobe Premiere Pro Ability to automatically apply lens flares to user-defined AE native lights in the composition Ability to auto-generate lens flares based on luma values Ability to auto-generate lens flares that follow the contour of AE native masks Automated flicker feature for lens flare light source, using AE native or built-in lights Automated randomize feature to flicker light intensity values ​​across multiple AE lights Automated shimmer feature for shimmering light rays Edge-trigger feature for boosting light intensity as it approaches and crosses the edge Sub-beam feature that generates Star Trek-style photon sci-fi flares Colored ring option Chroma hoop option Chroma fan option Lens caustics option Customizable lens surface textures with built-in looks Chromatic aberration option• Better Glows: The new BCC Film Glow effect includes a unique Crosstalk feature that blends the color of the glow with the image in a variety of ways, giving you the ability to generate looks that are not possible with other glow filters - a real game -changer for designers searching for new looks!• Better Lights: BCC's arsenal of lighting options has grown to include a new Stage Light filter that tightly integrates with AE's camera and lights and nicely complements AE's built-in lighting, providing a much-needed volumetric feel.• Unprecedented AE Integration: BCC 8 AE sets a new standard for AE integration, offering fast workflow and reducing your learning curve to virtually zero. BCC filters take full advantage of the excellent native 3D camera and light system that AE users depend on in their daily work. For path animations and image isolation tasks, BCC 8 filters import vector masks directly from AE layers. And for automated parameter animation, many BCC filters are now able to take advantage of audio data directly from AE audio tracks.• Better Image Restoration: Undesirable light flicker sometimes plagues irreplaceable camera shots. What can you do about it? 8 BCC AE comes to the rescue with a new Flicker Fixer tool that automatically solves the most challenging flickering light problems. Now footage so critical to your project becomes usable again!• New Videoscope Tool for AE: Full-featured and easy to use, the new BCC Videoscope filter means you no longer need to switch to a custom UI and deal with work-arounds to check color levels; the scopes are built right in to your Composite window! With vector scope and waveform monitors at your fingertips, you can be sure that you will never exceed legal color limits - while maintaining the overall integrity of your effects. A must-have for AE users!• 8 New Filters: BCC 8 AE's eight new filters include enhanced lens flares, particles, glows, and lights as well as new flicker reduction and videoscope tools. New Boris Continuum Complete 8 AE Filters: Videoscope Film Glow Flicker Fixer Lens Flare 3D Stage Light Particle Emitter 3D Organic Strands Wild Cards

SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: Pro Tools with Annual Upgrade and Support Plan - Student/Teacher (Card and iLok)
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION: Nejnovější software s licensí pro studenty. Vyžaduje potvrzený formulář od školy. Postup pro aktivaci license je popsán zde. Upozorňujeme, že Avid neposkytuje EDU slevu studentům středních škol. Pouze vyšších a vysokých škol.

Umožňuje připojit jakoukoliv profesionální analogovou (kompozit, S-Video, složky YUV)nebo digitální (SD / HD-SDI) kameru nebo rekordér pro profesionální střih, design, animaci nebo tvorbu televizní grafiky. PCI Express verze.
Prohlédněte si přehledné PDF s podporovanými kartami od Blacmagic Design v souvislosti s Avid střižnami. Základní informace ke kompatibilitě - Blackmagic Design – Open I/O

karta, která v sobě obsahuje v podstatě dvě karty DeckLink. DeckLink DUO obsahuje dva nezávisléSDI vstupy a výstupy v jedné 4-lane PCI Express kartě.
Prohlédněte si přehledné PDF s podporovanými kartami od Blacmagic Design v souvislosti s Avid střižnami. Základní informace ke kompatibilitě - Blackmagic Design – Open I/O

Nabírání a přehrání SD, HD, 2K a 4K.
Prohlédněte si přehledné PDF s podporovanými kartami od Blacmagic Design v souvislosti s Avid střižnami. Základní informace ke kompatibilitě - Blackmagic Design – Open I/O

SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: Pro Tools with Standard Support (12 Months) Activation Card
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION:
aktivační karta na Pro Tools včetně ročního Standard SupportuToto je nákup plné verze nové licence software.
Pro Tools přechází podobně jako Media Composer na nový způsob licencování softwarePozději se budou všechny upgrady software realzovat s pomocí nákupu Supportuzpočátku ještě budou možné crossgrady a upgrady ze starších verzí, později už ne.všechny upgrady budou obsahovat také 1-roční Supportv nabídce licencí je také měsíční a roční SubscriptionCloud audio archival service - zákazník si může zakoupit cloudový prostor pro archivaciPT 12 obsahují nové metadatové schema - otevřené pro vývoj aplikací od jiných výrobcůPro Tools | First - software ke stažení zdarma bez časového omezení. Omezení jsou však jen na 16 stop max. do 96kHz, nemůže pracovat s videostopou a podporuje maximálně 4 vstupy a výstupy. Nepodporuje surround zvuk. Projekty jsou kompatibilní s plnou verzí Pro Tools 12.

Softwarová verze celosvětově nejpopulárnějšího nástroje pro editaci videa, určená pro studenty, učitele filmových škol, lektory, nebo vzdělávací instituce. Pro objednání tohoto produktu je třeba spolu s objednávkou odfaxovat vyplněný a razítkem + podpisem odpovědné osoby potvrzený formulář (ke stažení zde ). Upozorňujeme, že Avid neposkytuje EDU slevu studentům středních škol. Pouze vyšších a vysokých škol.
Podporovaný hardware:Avid Nitris DXAvid Mojo DXBlackmagic Design DeckLink Matrox řady MXO2AJA Kona a AJA IOMOTUBlueFish 444Podporuje širokou škálu formátů od DV25, přes IMX50, 1:1 10bit SD, HDV, až po 10bit DNxHD video. Nechybí ani přímá podpora bezpáskových formátů Panasonic P2-HD, Sony XDCAM, XDCAM HD, XDCAM EX, AVC-Intra a GFCAM. Možnost umístit současně na časové ose různé kodeky, rozlišení a snímkové frekvence. Střih stereoskopického videa, nebo materiálu z RED kamer. Lze také připojit video rozhraní Matrox řady MXO2 , AJA Io , Blackmagic design, MOTU, bluefish 444, Mojo DX, Nitris DX. SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: Gefen prodloužení USB 2.0 přes optický kabel
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Prodlužuje rozhraní USB 2.0 až na 500 metrů přes multimodový optický kabel. Je možno připojit až čtyři koncová USB zařízení. Extender plní roli i čtyřportového Hubu.
Extends any high speed USB 2.0 device up to 1640 feet (500 meters) from the USB source over multimode fiber optics cableThis new USB Extender supports all USB 2.0 devices, extending to 1640 feet (500 meters) away from the USB source. The receiver end is also a four USB 2.0 hub. By using fiber optic cables, the new Gefen USB 400FO extends a long distance from the location of a computer. It provides an EMI interference-free solution for USB extension work.

SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: Gefen DVI na Mini Display port
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION:
převodník umožňuje připojit počítač s DVI výstupem k monitoru, který má pouze Mini Display port (většinou Apple modely LCD)
Allow your DVI computer to use displays equipped with the Mini Displayport interface.The DVI to Mini DisplayPort Converter enables computers with a single-link digital DVI-D interface to utilize display devices that have the Mini DisplayPort interface. DisplayPort is a standard that handles today's higher video resolutions and AV bandwidths while making connections simpler than in the past. Mini-DisplayPort is a variation of DisplayPort designed to save space. DisplayPort is used by a number of leading computer manufacturers.

Extender prodlužuje 3G-SDI signál na velké vzdálenosti - až do 20ti kilometrů.
3G-SDI Digital Video Transport System over Fiber OpticThe Gefen 3G-SDI Fiber Optic Extender is a miniature digital video transport system over fiber optic cable for 3G/HD-SDI. It transports a one-channel SMPTE-424M 3G-SDI, SMPTE-292M HD, or SMPTE-259M serial digital video signal over extended distances up to 12 miles (20 km) by using either single-mode or multi-mode fiber optic cable.Tento extender umožňuje přenos datového signálu přes optický kabel až do vzdálenosti 20 kilometrů.

SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: GefenTV Wireless for HDMI Extender LR
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Způsob, jak prodloužit HDMI signál v rozlišení až 1080p 60Hz až na 30 metrů bez použií kabelů. Extender používá standard HDMI 1.3 Toto řešení je vhodné například pro zobrazení HD obrazu v jiné místnosti, aniž by bylo potřeba rozvádět kabeláž.
Wirelessly extend HDMI at 1080p Full HD with multichannel digital audio up to 100 feet (30 meters)The GefenTV Wireless for HDMI Extender LR system sends high definition audio and video to any HDTV display up to 30 meters away. It extends HDMI from computers, set-top boxes, Blu-ray players, and other audio/video sources to a remote HDTV display. The Wireless for HDMI Extender LR supports resolutions up to 1080p Full HD along with support for 7.1-channels of digital audio in PCM, Dolby®, or DTS® formats. An IR emitter can be connected to the Sender unit and attached to the IR sensor lens of the hi-def source, allowing full control of the source from another room simply by pointing the IR remote at the receiver unit. The Wireless for HDMI Extender LR transmits through walls and does not require line-of-sight for good reception. Additional features allow multiple sender units where each display can access up to eight sources, using the included handheld remote control. Additionally you can run 2 pairs of extenders in the same room at the same time; the units must be at least one meter apart to work.Supported resolutions:HDTV: 1080p60, 1080p50, 1080p24, 1080i60, 1080i50, 720p60, 720p50, 576p50, 576i50, 480p60, 480i60VESA: 1600x1200, 1366x768, 1280x1024, 1024x768, 800x600, 640x48Features:- Wireless extension of HDMI up to 30 meters- Supports HDMI CEC protocol-Supports resolutions up to 1080p Full HD- HDMI Features Supported:Dolby® TrueHD, DTS-HD® Master Audio, and PCM digital audio up to 7.1 channels- 3DTV pass-through- HDCP pass-through- Lip Sync- Uncompressed High Definition A/V from source to display- No latency- DVI-D Support- Included IR remote for switching between up to three Sender units- WHDI 1.0, FCC Part 15, and ETSI-compliantTechnical Specifications:- Frequency Band Range: 5,125 - 5,850 GHz- Video Input Connector (Sender): 1x HDMI Type A, 19-pin, female- Video Output Connector (Receiver): 1x HDMI Type A, 19-pin, female- USB Connector (Sender / Receiver): 1x Mini-B (for Service only)- Power Supply (Sender/Receiver): 2x 5V DC- Power Consumption (Sender / Receiver): 8W (max.) / 8W (max.)- Dimensions (Sender / Receiver) (W x H x D): 148mm x 20mm x 96mm- Shipping Weight: 1,27 kgPackage includes:1x Wireless for HDMI Extender (Through-Walls Solution) - Sender Unit (GTV-WHD-1080P-LRS-BLK)1x Wireless for HDMI Extender (Through-Walls Solution) - Receiver Unit (GTV-WHD-1080P-LRR-BLK)2x 1,5 meters HDMI cables (M-M) (CAB-HDMI-05MM-O)1x IR Remote Control (RMT-WHD-IR)1x Single Infrared Emitter (GTV-WHD-IREMIT)2x Cradles for Sender and Receiver Units (ENC-GTV-WHD-BASE) 2x 5V/2A DC Power Supply (EXT-PS52A-GP3)1x Quick-Start Guide (QSG-GTV-WHD-1080P-LR-BLK)
Revoluční produkt pro kytarové nahrávání a efektování nabízí perfektní zpracování bez latence, včetně přiložených Pro Tools. Můžete jej také použít jako samostatný efektový procesor.

SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION:
SW podpora na 1 rok, což znamená že všechny aktualizace systému jsou zdarma po dobu trvání podpory. Avid Support nahlrazuje nákup Upgrade. - nevztahuje se na žádný Avid HW (např., MC Mojo DX , Nitris DX ). Tato cena je pro zákazníky, kteří mají střižnu od roku 2014-15 pod supportem. Pro objednávku musíte uvést v poznámce System ID, mít založený Avid Master Account a registraci aktuální verze licence
Získáte tedy:aktuální Media Composer | Software perpetual licenseNewBlue Titler Pro v1Sorenson Squeeze trialiZotope Insight (30ti denní trial)1 rok Avid Standard Support. Podporovaný hardware: Avid Artist | DNxIO (od v. 8.4)Avid Nitris DXAvid Mojo DXBlackmagic Design DeckLink Matrox řady MXO2AJA Kona a AJA IOMOTUBlueFish 444Podporuje širokou škálu formátů od DV25, přes IMX50, 1:1 10bit SD, HDV, až po 10bit DNxHD video. Přímá podpora bezpáskových formátů Panasonic P2-HD, Sony XDCAM, XDCAM HD, XDCAM EX, AVC-Intra a GFCAM. Možno pracovat s 2K / 4k / 5K medii s pomocí nástroje FrameFlexMožnost umístit současně na časové ose různé kodeky, rozlišení a snímkové frekvence. Umožňuje střih stereoskopického videa, nebo materiálu z RED kamer. Lze také připojit video převodníky řady Matrox MXO2, AJA, Blackmagic design, MOTU, bluefish 444, Mojo DX, Nitris DX. Software je cetrifikován na platformu Windows 7 64bit SP 1, Windows 8 a MacOS X 10.9.5 nebo Mac OS X 10.10. Software je funkční také na nových Apple Mac Pro. Softwarový doplněk který umožňuje synchronizovat a ovládat až 5 Pro Tools|HD systémů najednou. Je to speciální řešení pro velké postprodukce, kde potřebují sjednotit Pro Tools|HD zvukové systémy s více zvukovými operátory.
SHOPITEM.CATEGORYTEXT: Avid Audio | doplňky k Pro Tools

SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Levnější verze HD videoplaybacku pro ProTools|HD workfow. Umožňuje přehrávat QuickTime, nebo Avid video uložené na na odděleném PC v synchronním režimu s ProTools LE běžícím na Mbox 2 Micro. Jelikož přehrávání videa běží na externím ale syncronizovaném počítači, střihač stále využívá plný výkon Pro Tools|HD. Verze Video Satellite LE nemá podporu audio playbacku.
toto řešení je tedy pro vylepšení zvukového workflow mezi dvěma audio editory.
SHOPITEM.CATEGORYTEXT: Avid Audio | doplňky k Pro Tools

SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION: Softwarové rozšíření pro Pro Tools|HD které umožňuje jednoduše načítat a zobrazovat sekvence v SD nebo HD z Avid Media Composeru, který je spuštěn na jiném PC. Tyto sekvence a jejich efekty není nutno předem renderovat. Jelikož jde o přehrávání na synchronizovaném počítači, pracovní stanice k Pro Tools|HD stále běží na plný výkon.
SHOPITEM.CATEGORYTEXT: Avid Audio | doplňky k Pro Tools
